step.description: Happy path: Save screenshot to a valid file path and verify file creation and size.
Happy path: Save screenshot with explicit file extension and verify correct format is used.
Edge case: Save screenshot without an extension and verify default format (PNG) is applied.
Edge case: Attempt to save screenshot with empty file path to test validation logic.
